name: IMDb [ new design ] [ minimalistic ] [ no ads ]
description:
A style by toxdox.net and thesimplecomplex.co.uk.
All pages style is modifed so that the design is unified within them. Fixed width for all pages. No advertisement is shown. 
Completely new design.
Key modifications:
- index
- movie
- profile
- gallery
- videos
- news
- top movies
- registration
- login

For more detailed screenshots visit http://en.toxdox.net/publication/2009/7/user-styles#imdb
